description: Sylvain Helaine says a parent complained their three year old had nightmares after seeing him.
title: France's most tattooed man told not to teach nursery children
title_page: France's most tattooed man told not to teach nursery children - BBC News
maintext: He told BFM TV: "Children who see me learn tolerance of others. When they are adults, they may be less likely to be racist or homophobic, and they will not look at disabled people as if they were something from a circus."
